body_html: Thank you @carpodaster! I searched a little bit about contexts and you are right, it is really better to use it. I refactored the test file with your suggestions, but if you think there is another thing to improve just let me know.

body: Thank you @carpodaster! I searched a little bit about contexts and you are right, it is really better to use it. I refactored the test file with your suggestions, but if you think there is another thing to improve just let me know.
